author: AFP
title: Coronavirus | Europe, New York see progress in COVID-19 battle
description: Europe saw encouraging signs, with Italy, Spain, France and Britain seeing drops in daily death tolls and slowing infection rates.
content:
European nations hard hit by the coronavirus and the US epicentre New York reported headway Sunday in their battle against the deadly pandemic.
